name: wordle-date
description: Translate any date to its Wordle date... a number of days before or after Wordle #0 (June 19, 2021), AKA Wordle Morning, AKA 0 WD. Why are we still using the divisive outdated archaic BC/AD system? It's clearly time to update to Wordle Date. For example, if we say that New Year's Day after Jesus' birth is 1/1/0000, then Jesus was born on -738325 WD.
author: Dustin Huth
